com.logtracking.lib.api.config

Class LogConfiguration.LogConfigurationBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.logtracking.lib.api.config.LogConfiguration.LogConfigurationBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    LogConfiguration

    public static final class LogConfiguration.LogConfigurationBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Class helps to build object of LogConfiguration with custom parameters. Cannot be instantiated directly - use newDebugConfiguration(android.content.Context) or newProductionConfiguration(android.content.Context) method to instantiate pre-configured LogConfiguration.LogConfigurationBuilder.

    • Method Detail

      • newDebugConfiguration

        public static LogConfiguration.LogConfigurationBuilder newDebugConfiguration(android.content.Context context)
        Return new instance of LogConfiguration.LogConfigurationBuilder class , with recommended debug parameters.
        Parameters description:
        - Allowed android notification about report send result;
        - All logging available;
        - Log saving mode is LogConfiguration.LogSavingMode.SAVE_ALL_LOG_IN_FILE;
        - Log file rotation is LogConfiguration.LogFileRotationType.ROTATION_BY_SIZE with size 1 MB;
        - Collected default meta-data;
        - Log messages filtering by package of current application;
        - Folder with log files locate in application cache of in application folder if SD card not exist;
        - File format is LogConfiguration.LogFileFormat.DEFAULT;
        Parameters:
        context - application context
        Returns:
        new instance of default config.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if context null.

      • newProductionConfiguration

        public static LogConfiguration.LogConfigurationBuilder newProductionConfiguration(android.content.Context context)
        Return new instance of LogConfiguration.LogConfigurationBuilder class , with recommended production parameters.
        Parameters description:
        - Disallowed android notification about report send result;
        - Logging not available;
        - Log saving mode is LogConfiguration.LogSavingMode.SAVE_ONLY_IF_NEEDED;
        - Log file rotation is LogConfiguration.LogFileRotationType.NONE;
        - Collected default meta-data;
        - Issue report will be send on by WiFi.
        - Log messages filtering by package of current application;
        - Folder with log files locate in application cache of in application folder if SD card not exist.
        - File format is LogConfiguration.LogFileFormat.DEFAULT;
        Parameters:
        context - application context
        Returns:
        new instance of production config.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if context null.

      • setMinimumLoggingLevelAvaliable

        public LogConfiguration.LogConfigurationBuilder setMinimumLoggingLevelAvaliable(int minLoggingLevelAvailable)
        Set minimum level of log messages that should be send to system log using Log, LogUtils.
        Parameters:
        minLoggingLevelAvailable - minimum level of log messages that should be send to system log.
        Returns:
        current instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if level filter is out of bound between Log.VERBOSE and Log.ERROR
        See Also:
        Log, LogUtils

                                                      boolean internal)
        Add tag to filter messages , that will be saved in file.
        Parameters:
        tag - tag that should pass filter.
        internal - is tag relate to some internal part off application.
        Returns:
        current instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if tag is empty

      • setLevelFilter

        public LogConfiguration.LogConfigurationBuilder setLevelFilter(int levelFilter)
        Set level filter to save log messages in file only with this level or higher.
        Parameters:
        levelFilter - level of log messages that should pass filter.
        Returns:
        current instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if level filter is out of bound between Log.VERBOSE and Log.ERROR
        See Also:
        Log.VERBOSE, Log.DEBUG, Log.INFO, Log.WARN, Log.ERROR, Log.ASSERT

      • setLogFileRotationSize

        public LogConfiguration.LogConfigurationBuilder setLogFileRotationSize(long fileRotationSize)
        Set max log file size. If log file size is more, that was set, file rotation started. Also this method set file rotation mode - LogConfiguration.LogFileRotationType.ROTATION_BY_SIZE.
        Parameters:
        fileRotationSize - max size of file in bytes.
        Returns:
        current instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if fileRotationSize less then 0.

      • setLogFileRotationTime

        public LogConfiguration.LogConfigurationBuilder setLogFileRotationTime(long fileRotationTime)
        Set max log file live time in milliseconds. If log file live time is more , that was set, file rotation started. Also this method set file rotation mode - LogConfiguration.LogFileRotationType.ROTATION_BY_TIME.
        Parameters:
        fileRotationTime - max time of file living if milliseconds.
        Returns:
        current instance.

      • setLogFileNoRotation

        public LogConfiguration.LogConfigurationBuilder setLogFileNoRotation()
        Set mode file rotation mode - LogConfiguration.LogFileRotationType.NONE. During save messages in file, old messages will not be deleted.
        Returns:
        current instance.
